TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawTreeNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 事件可自定义使用所有者描述的控件中节点的外观 。Use the event to customize the appearance of nodes in a control using owner drawing. 当控件的 属性设置为 或 ，并且显示或更新节点时，该事件由控件引发。The event is raised by a control when its property is set to or and a node is displayed or updated. 传递给事件处理程序的包含要绘制的节点的相关信息，并提供可帮助您绘制节点的方法。The passed to the event handler contains information about the node to draw as well as providing methods to help you draw the node. 使用 或 属性检索有关要绘制的节点的信息。Use the or properties to retrieve information about the node to draw. 使用 属性可以在由属性指定的区域内执行实际绘图 。Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要使操作系统绘制不需要所有者描述的节点，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To make the operating system draw a node that does not need to be owner drawn, set the property to `true`. 当 属性设置为时 ，由属性指示的区域 仅包含节点的标签部分。When the property is set to , the area indicated by the property includes the label portion of the node only. 当 属性设置为时 ， 区域包括整个节点，包括通常用于图标、复选框、加号和减号以及连接节点的线条的区域。When the property is set to , the area includes the entire node, including the area typically used for icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用所有者描述自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 该示例中的控件在标准节点标签旁边显示可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 节点标记是使用属性指定的 。Node tags are specified using the property. 该 控件还使用自定义的突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以 通过设置颜色属性自定义大多数颜色，但无法将选择突出显示颜色作为属性提供。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形仅扩展到节点标签周围。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必须使用所有者绘图来绘制节点标记，并绘制一个足以容纳节点标记的自定义突出显示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 手动绘制节点标记和自定义选择突出显示。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些属性，将 属性设置为，以 `true` 使其由操作系统进行绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 此外，事件的处理程序 提供命中测试。Additionally, a handler for the event provides hit-testing. 默认情况下，只能通过单击其标签周围的区域来选择节点。By default, a node can be selected only by clicking the region around its label. 事件处理程序选择在此区域内或节点标记周围的区域（如果存在）内单击的节点。The event handler selects a node that is clicked anywhere within this region or within the region around a node tag, if present. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取要绘制的 的大小和位置。

span.span: Gets the size and location of the to draw.

value.span: 表示要绘制的 的界限的 。

span.span: A that represents the bounds of the to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的位置相对于控件的左上角 。The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the control. 当 属性设置为时 ，属性指定的区域 是一个区域，可在其中单击节点以将其选中。When the property is set to , the area specified by the property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it. 如果在此命中测试区域外绘制，则应提供自己的代码，以便在单击节点可见区域时选择节点。If you draw outside this hit test region, you should provide your own code for selecting a node when its visible area is clicked. 当属性设置为时，可能还需要提供自己的命中测试代码 。You may also want to provide your own hit test code when the property is set to . 在此模式下， 属性在整个控件的整个宽度内包含整个节点 ，而不是仅命中测试区域。In this mode, the property encompasses the whole node across the entire width of the control, rather than the just hit test region. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用所有者描述自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 该示例中的控件在标准节点标签旁边显示可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 节点标记是使用属性指定的 。Node tags are specified using the property. 该 控件还使用自定义的突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以 通过设置颜色属性自定义大多数颜色，但无法将选择突出显示颜色作为属性提供。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形仅扩展到节点标签周围。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必须使用所有者绘图来绘制节点标记，并绘制一个足以容纳节点标记的自定义突出显示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 手动绘制节点标记和自定义选择突出显示。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些属性，将 属性设置为，以 `true` 使其由操作系统进行绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否将由操作系统绘制 ，而不是所有者描述。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the should be drawn by the operating system rather than being owner drawn.

value.span: 如果节点将由操作系统进行绘制，则为 ；如果节点将由事件处理程序进行绘制，则为 。

span.span: if the node should be drawn by the operating system; if the node will be drawn in the event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果你不想在处理事件时自定义节点，请将此属性设置为 。Set this property to `true` for nodes that you do not want to customize when you handle the event. 例如，当你想要仅自定义处于特定状态的节点时，这非常有用。For example, this is useful when you want to customize only nodes that are in a specific state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序为 选定的节点手动绘制节点标记和自定义突出显示颜色。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tag and a custom highlight color manually for the selected node. 未选择的节点不需要自定义。Nodes that are not selected do not need customization. 对于未选定的节点，将 属性设置为， `true` 以使其由操作系统绘制，并且不具有自定义的外观。For unselected nodes, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system and will not have a customized appearance. > [!NOTE] > 如果手动绘制节点，同时将 属性设置为 `true` ，则操作系统可能会覆盖部分或全部你绘制的内容。If you draw a node manually and also set the property to `true`, some or all of what you draw may be overwritten by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取用于绘制 的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object used to draw the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的属性和方法可用于在显示设备上进行绘制。The class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用所有者描述自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 该示例中的控件在标准节点标签旁边显示可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 节点标记是使用属性指定的 。Node tags are specified using the property. 该 控件还使用自定义的突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以 通过设置颜色属性自定义大多数颜色，但无法将选择突出显示颜色作为属性提供。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形仅扩展到节点标签周围。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必须使用所有者绘图来绘制节点标记，并绘制一个足以容纳节点标记的自定义突出显示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 手动绘制节点标记和自定义选择突出显示。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些属性，将 属性设置为，以 `true` 使其由操作系统进行绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可访问 要绘制的对象。Use this property to access the object to draw. 当 属性没有提供足够的信息来满足您的需求时，这非常有用。This is useful when the property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 属性仅提供可供您使用的基本状态信息，例如，确定节点是否处于选中状态、选中状态或焦点。The property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused. 另一方面 ，属性允许您访问对象的所有成员 。The property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the object. 您必须直接访问该节点，例如，当您想要确定其扩展状态时。You must access the node directly, for example, when you want to determine its expansion state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用所有者描述自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 该示例中的控件在标准节点标签旁边显示可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 节点标记是使用属性指定的 。Node tags are specified using the property. 该 控件还使用自定义的突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以 通过设置颜色属性自定义大多数颜色，但无法将选择突出显示颜色作为属性提供。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形仅扩展到节点标签周围。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必须使用所有者绘图来绘制节点标记，并绘制一个足以容纳节点标记的自定义突出显示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 手动绘制节点标记和自定义选择突出显示。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些属性，将 属性设置为，以 `true` 使其由操作系统进行绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取要绘制的 的当前状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the to draw.

value.span: 值的按位组合，指示 的当前状态。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values indicating the current state of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性检查 要绘制的对象是否处于特定状态。Use this property to check whether the object to draw is in a particular state. 此属性仅提供有关节点的基本状态信息。This property provides only basic state information about the node. 例如，您可以使用此属性来确定节点是否处于选中状态、选中状态或焦点。You can use this property, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused. 如果需要了解详细信息，请通过属性检索节点 。If you need to know more, retrieve the node through the property. 例如，若要确定节点是否已展开，必须检索节点并检查 属性。For example, to determine whether the node is expanded, you must retrieve the node and check the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用所有者描述自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 该示例中的控件在标准节点标签旁边显示可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 节点标记是使用属性指定的 。Node tags are specified using the property. 该 控件还使用自定义的突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 您可以 通过设置颜色属性自定义大多数颜色，但无法将选择突出显示颜色作为属性提供。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形仅扩展到节点标签周围。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 必须使用所有者绘图来绘制节点标记，并绘制一个足以容纳节点标记的自定义突出显示矩形。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在此示例中，事件的处理程序 手动绘制节点标记和自定义选择突出显示。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些属性，将 属性设置为，以 `true` 使其由操作系统进行绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic.
